libraries.name: Array
libraries.author: Peter Polidoro <peterpolidoro@gmail.com>
libraries.sentence: An array container similar to the C++ std::array
libraries.paragraph: Like this project? Please star it on GitHub!

libraries.name: esp8266-framework
libraries.author: Suraj I.
libraries.sentence: esp8266 framework stack for easy configurable applications
libraries.paragraph: esp8266 framework includes all services like gpio, wifi, http, mqtt, ntp, ota, napt, espnow, mesh, server etc. which are ready to use in all applications

libraries.name: Painless Mesh
libraries.author: Coopdis,Scotty Franzyshen,Edwin van Leeuwen,Germán Martín,Maximilian Schwarz,Doanh Doanh
libraries.sentence: A painless way to setup a mesh with ESP8266 and ESP32 devices
libraries.paragraph: A painless way to setup a mesh with ESP8266 and ESP32 devices

libraries.name: Pushdata_ESP8266_SSL
libraries.author: Ragnar Lonn
libraries.sentence: Free, ultra-simple time series data storage for your IoT sensors
libraries.paragraph: Pushdata.io client library that makes it very simple to store your time series data online

libraries.name: RF24Mesh
libraries.author: TMRh20
libraries.sentence: A library for NRF24L01(+) devices mesh.
libraries.paragraph: Provides a simple and seamless 'mesh' layer for sensor networks, allowing automatic and dynamic configuration that can be customized to suit many scenarios. It is currently designed to interface directly with with the RF24Network Development library, an OSI Network Layer using nRF24L01(+) radios driven by the newly optimized RF24 library fork.

libraries.name: RTCtime
libraries.author: smz <tinker@smz.it>
libraries.sentence: A "Standard C Runtime" compatible library for interfacing the DS1307 and DS3231 Real Time Clock modules.
libraries.paragraph: This library is for getting/setting time from hardware RTC modules. It uses an API compatible with the AVR implementation of the Standard C runtime time library as available in the Arduino IDE since version 1.6.10 (AVR C Runtime Library 2.0.0)

libraries.name: DLLN3X ZigBee Mesh Module Library
libraries.author: Duke Liu <mentalflow@ourdocs.cn>
libraries.sentence: This library allows you to use DLLN3X ZigBee mesh module very easily.
libraries.paragraph: This library currently allows basic send and receive operations using the DLLN3X module, with more features to come.
